pages.text: $(item)Impure Ash$() is the distilled essence of common earthen materials.$(br2)Its impurity comes from the raw nature of the calcination process, though said impurity lends it essential properties to $(thing)Alchemical Artificing$(), particularly the branch of $(thing)ritualism$().
$(item)Impure Ash$() is created through a $(l:intro/calcinator)Calcinator$(), using materials such as $(item)Cobblestone$(), $(item)Sand$(), or $(item)Gravel$()
